title: My Mission
text: My mission is to create a great reporter community. Those who will truly be the mirror of the society and the state. Wherever he sees any injustice, corruption he will fearlessly present it in the media.

title: My Vision
text: You must dream - where you want to see yourself in the future. At the same time we have to be able to implement it. I need to have a clear idea of what my vision is. Otherwise you will never reach your goal.

title: My Ambition
text: You have to decide now where you want to go. As such, my goal is to become a good quality journalist. I always think about how to improve the quality of my profession and I work hard regularly to implement it.
